Html:
Hi there,

 

Been reading the documentation for the MVVM feature in Prism v4. It appears you have to create the ViewModelBase base class by hand.

 

Of course this isn't a problem but i was wondering if i am missing something, are there templates available that i am unaware of that automatically create the viewmodelbase classes etc?

 

Or is it a case of create a viewmodelbase class once by hand and then reusing it in my projects?

 

Thanks in advance
In Microsoft.Practices.Prism.ViewModel you will find the NotificationObject that is the viewmodelbase.  Of course its a just a basic implementation you can always modify to suit your needs.
